issue.title: [C++] Support LLVM 12
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12478](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12478). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is a new LLVM version available from macOS brew which causes build errors since the newest llvm version we support is 11.1
